newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT-Telebras still a buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-Telebras still a buy.

text.p: -- Salomon Brothers said in a report it was maintaining its buy rating on Brazilian state-owned telecom Telebras .
-- It raised Telebras 1997 earnings per share estimate to $10.85 from $10.17 and 1998 earnings estimate to $13.30 from $13.05.
-- The brokerage used an exchange rate of 1.14 reais per U.S. dollar, it said.
-- Brazil's telephone rate restructuring announced on late Thursday was "more aggressive than expected," affecting 80 percent of Telebras revenues, it said.
-- "Under the new tariff structure, Brazil telephony charges are more in line with those of the rest of Latin America," it added.
-- Telebras preferred shares traded at 121.35 reais, up 5.43 percent.
